s_synopsis: Here's the deal... The New Order Nation - a powerful, corrupt alliance is crushing today's youth and destroying all things fun. It's a gruesome regime, under the iron rule of Headmistress Helga, a vicious vamp whose obvious attractions are fatal. Suddenly, America's premiere rock band, Aerosmith, is abducted by NON forces. Now it's up to you to stop the destruction... and Music is the Weapon!
